content.text:
# Eric Schwartz (comedian)

}}
Eric Scott Schwartz, also known as "Smooth-E", is an American comedian, musician, and actor from Thousand Oaks, California known for his blend of stand-up comedy, music, and video.
Stand-up comedy
In 2013, Schwartz was billed as "one of the nationâ€™s hottest rising stand up headliners", Eric Schwartz regularly performs as the headliner at The Improv and The Laugh Factory comedy clubs while on tour.
